code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NoteCard=_ref=>{let{note,onDelete}=_ref;const formattedDate=new Date(note.created_at).toLocaleString();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-800 p-4 rounded-lg shadow-md hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold text-white",children:note.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-300 mb-3",children:note.content}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-xs text-gray-500",children:["Created at: ",formattedDate]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-end gap-2 mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/edit/${note.id}`,className:"bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-600 text-white px-3 py-2 rounded flex items-center gap-1",children:"\u270F\uFE0F Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onDelete(note.id),className:"bg-red-500 hover:bg-red-600 text-white px-3 py-2 rounded flex items-center gap-1",children:"\uD83D\uDDD1 Delete"})]})]});};export default NoteCard;
